Subject: [Bank Aladin]EPP Server Sizing Recommendation and Support Information for Customer Deployment
Description:

The customer has the following endpoints:
300 Windows endpoints
200 macOS endpoints

- 20-30% of endpoints will have fileshadowing enabled.
-  The server will be deployed on the customer's Google Cloud Platform (GCP) infrastructure.
